vote.title: Authorize acquisition from heirs at law of A.T. Mitchell, wife, Nellie Mitchell, heirs at law of Anselmo Valdivia, deceased, and wife, Dawn Valdivia and Rogelio Garcia Hernandez, of approximately 5,406 square feet of land improved with a single-family dwelling located near the intersection of Childers and Gloyd Streets for the Cadillac Heights Phase II Project - Not to exceed $111,000.00 ($107,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $4,000.00) - Financing: Land Acquisition in Cadillac Heights Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
